member.remarks: Add to the Error Log using the Exception() method

member.name: M:Main.Main.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.Drawing.Icon)
member.summary: Initialize the parameters
member.param: Some information to display in the about dialog
When the development/copyright of this application started
member.remarks: It is required to call this routine before any other methods. The parameters are optional to prevent errors. However, it is strongly recommended to set all variables, except for the AppCopyright because this is dynamically set using the other provided AppCopyright variables.

member.name: F:Main.Main.AppCopyright
member.summary: The copyright text
member.remarks: The year is defined in AppCopyrightStartYear and is displayed as YYYY. If the current year is later than the initial year, it is displayed as YYYY-YYYY.
